leader.name: Mahatma Gandhi
leader.achievement: Father of the Nation; Led India to Independence through non-violence

leader.name: Subhas Chandra Bose
leader.achievement: Founder of the Indian National Army (INA)

leader.name: Jawaharlal Nehru
leader.achievement: First Prime Minister of India; Advocate for industrialization

leader.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel
leader.achievement: Unified India; Known as the Iron Man of India

leader.name: APJ Abdul Kalam
leader.achievement: Missile Man of India; Former President
